dashboard.description: Real-Time SafeSquid Performance Stats provides live monitoring of SafeSquid proxy performance, including bandwidth usage, request processing times, cache efficiency, and system health. Ideal for network administrators to optimize performance and troubleshoot issues in real time.

targets.query: NOT transactions_handled_delta: 0 AND total_time_delta: [1 TO *] AND hostname: $hostname AND server_ip: $server_ip

dashboard.title: SafeSquid - Performance Plots
